author: Jacob Dressler
description:
In addition to Netflix‘s catalogue that includes some major exclusive shows, many of which are original IPs, there are quite a few that revive classic properties. One such property has finally been given the greenlight for a reboot, and with production finally starting, Netflix has unveiled the first look at the highly-anticipated series. In addition [...]

The post Netflix Reveals First Look At Reboot Of Beloved Classic Series appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Netflix Reveals First Look At Reboot Of Beloved Classic Series
